main event: An unidentified object shaped like a drop of water with a diameter of approximately 15 inches was reported over the Gulf of Mexico off New Orleans on July 15, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed with ground-radar and classified as a 'probably balloon' in the conclusion., The observation lasted for one day., The object was reported to be flat and cylindrical, appearing hazy white and semi-transparent., It was noted to have an inner balloon resembling drips of water at times., The estimated altitude of the object was around 5,000 feet.
sighted object: an unidentified object resembling a drop of water
location: Gulf of Mexico, New Orleans, USA
